name: ROBOtrio
description:
Made in 48 hours for #WonderjamUQAC
Game Jam Theme : Connection
Styles : Coop-Combat

---

Build your dream team to control a giant mech and protect your city from the cosmic horror destroying it!

Each player control a mech's part:

  • Player 1 control combat parts of the mech as gun and shield
  • Player 2 control energy distribution through your mech. Two others players need energy to do their actions
  • Player 3 control position and ca move, jump and use jetpack. 

3 controllers are required to local play this game  (You also can play online by using Parsec)
